challenge.title: Dr. Michael Greger - How Not to Die
challenge.description: Dr. Michael Greger's How Not To Die (2015) book is a tome of helpful, science-based information on the benefits of a whole food, plant-based diet.
challenge.instructions: Read How Not To Die (the book) on E-Reserve at Archive.org (requires an Archive.org account).

pageContext.name: Dr. Michael Greger - How Not to Die
pageContext.prevName: Dr. Michael Greger - HOW NOT TO DIE - The Role of Diet in Preventing, Arresting, & Reversing Our Top 15 Killers
